text.author: Mark Dingemanse, Francisco Torreira, N.J. Enfield (see URL)
text.title: Is “Huh?” a Universal Word? Conversational Infrastructure and the Convergent Evolution of Linguistic Items
text.summary: Using literature on 31 lanuages and recorded data from 10 languages, this paper argues that 'huh' is a universal word used across languages by listeners to initiate repair in conversation when they do not understand speakers.
